title: Sand
description: A study in warmth and tension — golden undercurrents beneath a sweeping arc of shadow. Inspired by desert light at the moment it breaks across stone.

title: Satellite
description: Celestial mechanics translated to surface. The cold geometry of orbit rendered in deep blacks and silver — stillness at the edge of atmosphere.

title: Ocean
description: Fluid dynamics caught in resin — cerulean and cobalt layered in geological time. The depth of water made tactile.

title: Fresa
description: Sweetness amplified into abstraction. Pink bleeds into magenta, edges dissolving like sugar in heat.

title: Sangre
description: Deep crimson pools and ripples — the visceral energy of movement captured at the moment of impact.

title: Dune
description: Topographic shadows folded into each other — the cartography of sand written in light and dark.

title: Nuclear
description: Acid green descends into the void. A single drip as statement — energy contained, barely.

title: Tide
description: The perpetual exchange between sand and sea — textural layers built up and eroded in the same gesture.
